hero.title: Revitalize your health
hero.sub-title: Find the doctor you are looking for
hero.paragraph: Healthify helps you finding and booking doctor's appointments with a user-friendly interface.

newsletter: By submitting your email address you will receive emails with our offers, new products, news, and more.
callToAction: Take control of your healthcare appointments today with Healthify! Our user-friendly app makes it easy to search for doctors, read reviews from other patients, and book appointments that fit your schedule.
